entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:57 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: NNW 19 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
